title: The Joe Rogan Experience
description: The Joe Rogan Experience is a long form, in-depth conversation with the best guests from the comedy, science, and entertainment worlds.

episodes.title: Elon Musk
episodes.description: Elon Musk is a business magnate, investor, and engineer. He is the founder, CEO, and lead designer of SpaceX; co-founder, CEO, and product architect of Tesla, Inc.

episodes.title: Neil deGrasse Tyson
episodes.description: Neil deGrasse Tyson is an astrophysicist, author, and science communicator. He is the Frederick P. Rose Director of the Hayden Planetarium at the Rose Center for Earth and Space.

episodes.title: Jordan Peterson
episodes.description: Jordan Peterson is a clinical psychologist and professor of psychology at the University of Toronto. He is the author of the best-selling book 12 Rules for Life: An Antidote to Chaos.

title: Serial
description: Serial tells one story — a true story — over the course of a season. Each season, we follow a plot and characters wherever they take us. We won’t know what happens at the end until we get there, not long before you get there with us.

episodes.title: The Alibi
episodes.description: It's Baltimore, 1999. Hae Min Lee, a popular high-school senior, disappears after school one day. Six weeks later detectives arrest her classmate and ex-boyfriend, Adnan Syed, for her murder.

episodes.title: The Breakup
episodes.description: Adnan once again professes his innocence, and Sarah, in an effort to confirm his story, talks to another person who remembers the day Hae disappeared: the man who found her body.
